name: OpenPV
description: OpenPV is a web-based application used by clinicians, regulatory bodies, and implementing partners to actively monitor the safety of medicines. It is part of the OpenRIMS suite (openrims.org).

sdgs.relevance: Ensuring safe use of medicines (3.8 Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all.)

bestPractices:
- Agile development.
- WHO Digital Principles of Digital Development.
- CI/CD on Azure DevOps.
- GitHub actions.

dataPrivacySecurity.collectsPII: PII data is collected and stored but NOT distributed.
dataPrivacySecurity.dataPrivacySecurity: To ensure privacy and data protection we are applying the following privacy policy (https://github.com/MSH/PViMS-2/blob/master/policyandterms/privacypolicy.pdf). Inaddition to that we are applying encryption and obfuscation of PII at database level

userContent.contentManagement: Content is NOT collected NOT stored and NOT distributed.

deploymentCountriesDepartments:
Bangladesh - DGDA
Mozambique - ANARME
Rwanda - RFDA

NonPII.nonPIIAccessMechanism:
PViMS uses Swagger API to handle data.
This is both PULL and POST using .json or .xml.: https://pv-api.openrims.org/"
